resources.string: "Welcome! Please insert your email to login."
"Oh, a new user! To complete your registration you just need to type your name"
"Your internet connection is off. We're showing you a version of your feed updated at %s, so it may be outdated."
"Failed to load more cat breeds. Please check your internet connection or try again later."
"Something went wrong. Tap to try again."
"Check your internet connection and tap to try again."
"Check your internet connection and try again."
"You have no favorites. You can add a cat breed as your favorite on the 'All' tab or on its details page."
"No results.\nPlease change your filters to get more results."
"There are no cat breeds to show right now. Please, try again later."
